name: My Idle Cacti
description:
My Idle Cacti

My Idle Cacti is an idle virtual pet game created for the Virtual Pet Jam, where the player must look after their pet cacti in order to earn seeds!

Look after your own garden of cacti! Name and customise your pets to make them truly unique, and take good care of them to receive seeds to buy more plants! This game is truly idle and will earn you seeds whilst you are away, as long as you pop in and look after your pets from time to time!

Twitter: @kaceyhalstead

Blog: kaceyhalstead.wordpress.com
